00052 namespace {
00053 
00054   struct MyPolicy : Config::Policy {
00055     static void init_options() {
00056       alias("port", "Hypertable.Master.Port");
00057       alias("workers", "Hypertable.Master.Workers");
00058       alias("reactors", "Hypertable.Master.Reactors");
00059     }
00060   };
00061 
00062   typedef Meta::list<MyPolicy, GenericServerPolicy, DfsClientPolicy,
00063           HyperspaceClientPolicy, DefaultCommPolicy> Policies;
00064 
00065   class HandlerFactory : public ConnectionHandlerFactory {
00066   public:
00067     HandlerFactory(Comm *comm, ApplicationQueuePtr &app_queue,
00068                    MasterPtr &master_ptr)
00069       : m_comm(comm), m_app_queue_ptr(app_queue), m_master_ptr(master_ptr) { }
00070 
00071     virtual void get_instance(DispatchHandlerPtr &dhp) {
00072       dhp = new ConnectionHandler(m_comm, m_app_queue_ptr, m_master_ptr);
00073     }
00074 
00075   private:
00076     Comm                *m_comm;
00077     ApplicationQueuePtr  m_app_queue_ptr;
00078     MasterPtr            m_master_ptr;
00079   };
00080 
00081 } // local namespace
00082 
00083 
00084 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00085   try {
00086     init_with_policies<Policies>(argc, argv);
00087 
00088     uint16_t port = get_i16("port");
00089     int worker_count  = get_i32("workers");
00090 
00091     Comm *comm = Comm::instance();
00092     ConnectionManagerPtr conn_mgr = new ConnectionManager(comm);
00093     ApplicationQueuePtr app_queue = new ApplicationQueue(worker_count);
00094     MasterPtr master = new Master(properties, conn_mgr, app_queue);
00095     ConnectionHandlerFactoryPtr hf(new HandlerFactory(comm, app_queue, master));
00096     InetAddr listen_addr(INADDR_ANY, port);
00097 
00098     comm->listen(listen_addr, hf);
00099 
00100     master->join();
00101     comm->close_socket(listen_addr);
00102   }
00103   catch (Exception &e) {
00104     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00105     return 1;
00106   }
00107   return 0;
00108 }
